citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on April 6,
2023. Inspector knocked on the door and contact was made. Inspector was informed the licensee was away and not
available for an inspection and there were no other authorized kennel representatives available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on April 6, 
2023. Inspector knocked on the door and contact was made. Inspector was informed the licensee was away and not 
available for an inspection and there were no other authorized kennel representatives available. 
 
 
 
End Section
